## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                     | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `ariaLabel` | `aria-label` | Specifies the label to use for accessibility. Defaults to the icon name.                        | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `undefined` |
| `color`     | `color`      | Basic text color variations.                                                                    | `"inherit" \| "neutral-grey-1" \| "neutral-grey-2" \| "neutral-grey-3" \| "neutral-grey-4" \| "neutral-grey-5" \| "neutral-grey-6" \| "neutral-grey-7" \| "neutral-grey-8" \| "porsche-black" \| "porsche-light" \| "porsche-red"` | `"inherit"` |
| `lazy`      | `lazy`       | If enabled, ion-icon will be loaded lazily when it's visible in the viewport. Default, `false`. | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `false`     |
| `size`      | `size`       | The size of the icon.                                                                           | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                                                                                                                                                                                                   | `"small"`   |
| `source`    | `source`     | Specifies which icon to use.                                                                    | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `undefined` |
